Bean.Author: 田文博

Bean.English: Add host (ip=%1, port=%2) failed, Error: %3

Bean.English: Delete host (ip=%1) success

Bean.English: Delete host (ip=%1) failed, Error: %2

Bean.English: Modify host (ip=%1, port=%2) failed, Error: %3

Bean.English: Get disk group failed, Error: %1
